description:
Stanton House have partnered with cutting edge SaaS Security (SSPM) company backed by some of the top VC firms and industry veterans to secure them a Regional Sales Manager, you'll be a hunter, tasked with prospecting, building pipeline and closing six figure deals.

What we are looking for?
• Someone who has sold SaaS security. cloud security, identity security or related security solutions.
• Minimum of 5 years selling to enterprise level accounts (Fortune 2000's).
• Someone located in Central, Mountain, or Pacific timezones.

Why would you be interested?
• You'll be joining an high-growth company who, is back by some of the top investment firms in the industry, have grown YoY, have several Fortune 100-2000 customers and a strong competitive win rate.

Unfortunately candidates who don't meet the requirements, will not be considered.
